name: Prom Girl Makeover - Make Up & Dress Up Girls Spa
name_original: Prom Girl Makeover - Make Up & Dress Up Girls Spa
description:
Help to Prom girl to look beauty with new fashion stylist. Prom Makeover Salon present Prom Makeup and costume. Every Prom Princess Doll want to look like bridal fashion girls in her own Prom theme Party.
Help her to look fabulous in Prom Night



Game Features:-
-Spa
  - Makeup
  - Dress up

-> Spa

Apply unique and beautiful face packs to make American Girl look more beautiful!
Remove her pimples, extra eye brow hairs, under eye marks, black dots and give her a clean and

-> Make-up

Help American Prom girl to look beautiful with unique Dress and Make-up.
Give her Fashion look with beautiful makeup.
Give American Prom Doll more stunning look with unique eye shadows and glow.
Make her cheeks more charming with unique cheek glow options
American Prom make up would be incomplete without attractive lipsticks and lip glow

-> Dress up

We have specially created unique outfits to give your American girl to a perfect stunning and
charming Prom Party look!
